ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: that He destroyed 'Ad, the earlier people,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: That it was He who destroyed the 'Ad of old,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: that He it is Who destroyed the ancient 'Ad,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It is He who utterly destroyed the ancient tribes of Ad,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And that it is He Who earlier destroyed the tribe of Aad?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And that it is He Who destroyed the former `Ad,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And that He did destroy the Ad of old
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and that He destroyed Ad, the ancient,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And that He destroyed the former (tribe of) A'ad,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: It was He who totally destroyed the former 'Ad
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And that He destroyed the former 'A-ad.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: that it is He who destroyed the former ‘Ad,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And that it is He Who destroyed the (powerful) ancient 'Ad (people),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And that it is He (Allah) Who destroyed the former 'Ad (people),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: that it was He that destroyed ancient Aad
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And that it is He who destroyed the first Aad.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And that He destroyed the first [people of] 'Aad
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [53:50] and that He destroyed former ‘Ād (‘Ādan al-ūlā: a variant reading elides the nunation with the [following] lām [sc. ‘Āda’l-ūlā]; this [former one] refers to the people of ‘Ād, while the second [‘Ād] is that of the people of Sālih)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And that He destroyed the former (tribe of) 'Aad) the folk of Hud,
